remarks: The inverse of an Abelian group operation.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)
statement:
ablinvadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablinvadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
ablinvadd.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
ablinvadd $p |- ( ( G e. Abel /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( N ` ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( ( N ` X ) .+ ( N ` Y ) ) ) $.
